channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 17:57 Dumping anxiety in the Donetsk region.Creb
item.description: 游릭 17:57 Dumping anxiety in the Donetsk region.Creb This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 17:56 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 17:56 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
